name: ATOLL: THE LAST GHOST
description:
After the first incident, the world was haunted. 

Assemble your team of ghosts and bring this world to salvation.

!!!THIS GAME IS ONLY FOR 1920x1080 MONITORS AND DOESNT SUPPORT  SCALING!!!
IF YOU WANT TO HAVE A GOOD EXPERIENCE WHEN YOU PLAY IN BROWSER PLEASE PRESS PLAY IN FULL SCREEN WITH A 1920x1080 MONITOR!

(i am working on a fix)

The game features:

- 6 locations;

- 2 endings;

- about 5-10(minutes gameplay);

How to play?

Use your mouse to click on diffent screens and buttons.

You can click on location screen to read about the area.

Use "E" button on keyboard to skip messages.

If you attack YOU WILL recieve damage that equals your opponents attack.

You CANT USE your items DURING THE BATTLE so plan ahead.

You can click on portraits of your team to read bio of ghosts you found.

In most areas item drops ARE RANDOM.

Made for #BrackeysGameJam 2021 by Nickolay Zholudev.

Most of the assests were created   during the jam.

 Premade assets:

 -  different  enviroment sounds from freesound.org;

- cursors and transition screen (premade by me);

Assets made during the jam:

- Everything else;
